summary: This document contains various Schedule K-1 forms for the year 2012, detailing the income, deductions, and credits for partners in the partnership SV America Holdings, LLC. It includes information about the partner Blue Chip Capital, LLC, and outlines their share of income and tax-related details. The document is significant as it provides insights into the financial dealings of the partnership and its partners.
